page.title: 18TRANSPORT:USAGE SURVEYS
page.content: Rushden Our amenities count revealed only two bus routes in our area. We asked shoppers about the transport they used. 44% of shoppers questioned in Rushden walked into town. 41% drove into town. 74% travelled by car out of town. 25% relied on buses for out of town travel. 50% thought public transport was inade- quate in the Rushden area. 14% couldn't express an opinion on this question! Car Ownership 69% of(mainly)women questioned in Rush- den could drive a car.In Irchester 60% of families have 1 car.Another 23% have 2 cars.Most popular were Ford(34%) and Austin/Rover(23%).Maintenance:33% never used garages,31% used them only for major repairs,36% depended on garages.
